name: WOAHDS!
description:
WOAHDS! is a 2-4 player virtual board game.

The object of the game is to be the last surviving player. Players will take turns moving around the board and drawing scenario cards. If a player fails in a scenario they will lose health and will be eliminated when they have no more health. Do not worry, though...some scenarios will increase your health, there are health spaces that will increase your health, and there is a store, which can help you or really shake the game up.Features
  • Hundreds of scenarios.
  • 2-4 players.
  • Rectangular play area with 50 spaces.
  • Coins and a Store.
  • Simple controls.
Free UpdatesWOAHDS! has hundreds of scenarios and more will be added in free updates to keep the game fresh and exciting. The Woahdside Kwik Stop & Shop will have new items in stock and the Den will have new punishments for you to fear.Simple ControlsNo keyboard or gamepad required. Only a mouse with left click and right click.
